name: divsqrsum
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0

stmt.origin: simp2i(wcel(c0, cdm(crli)), wf(c0, crp, cr), wi(wa(wbr(c0, crli, nat1), wcel(nat1, crp)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, nat1), cmin, nat1)), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(csqrt, nat1)))))

comment: The sum ` sum_ n <_ x ( 1 / sqrt n ) ` is asymptotic to ` 2 sqrt x + L ` with a finite limit ` L ` . (In fact, this limit is ` zeta ( 1 / 2 ) ~~ -u 1 . 4 6 ... ` .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-May-2016.)
